front.title: Use of the Prefer Header Field in Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning (WebDAV)

abstract.t: This document defines how the Prefer header field (RFC 7240) can be used by a Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning (WebDAV) client to request that certain behaviors be employed by a server while constructing a response to a request. Furthermore, it defines the new "depth-noroot" preference.
